price: Pero sepan que solo se les retribuirá por lo que [ustedes mismos] hicieron.
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
